contentText.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"RIBBIT, and welcome to our newly updated, super fresh website!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This has been an ongoing project for a while now, and we are so happy to finally have a website that is up to date, and representative of us and the journey we have been on. You might as well keep an eye on it, because there will be some more updates in the near future. For example - we will share news posts about what we have been up to, update our portfolio, and also share pictures from an official photoshoot so you can get a visual of all the frogs.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"ENJOY!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"7s5K1ESAy7IkNDVWlPHxvV","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

nodes.title: New Website
nodes.shortText: RIBBIT, and welcome to our newly updated, super fresh website!

nodes.title: D-Corp on Nintendo Switch
nodes.shortText: Frogsong Studios are happy to announce that D-Corp was released on Nintendo Switch the 21st of July 2023, in collaboration with Red Deer Games.

nodes.title: D-Corp Arena Mode
nodes.shortText: This free update introduces PvP - player-versus-player gameplay.
